Serialized Form

  • Package jtxt.emulator

    • Class jtxt.emulator.BufferedFrame extends GlyphBuffer implements Serializable

    • Class jtxt.emulator.LocationOutOfBoundsException extends java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException implements Serializable

    • Class jtxt.emulator.Renderer extends javax.swing.JComponent implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      1L

      • Serialized Fields

        • screen

          java.awt.image.BufferedImage screen
          This is a screenshot of the screen before we began rendering. When the transparency of the window is less than 1.0f, the pixels of this image are combined with those of the terminal to give an illusion of a transparent window.

        • background

          java.awt.Color background
          The color that is painted behind the text in the terminal.

        • transparency

          float transparency
          The transparency of this component. (A value less than 1.0f will cause the values of pixels behind the window to be combined with those of the terminal, to give the illusion of transparency.)

        • rasterizer

          GlyphRasterizer rasterizer
          The GlyphRasterizer that is used to convert the frames passed to this renderer into an image suitable for drawing to the screen.

        • rasterizedFrame

          java.awt.image.RenderedImage rasterizedFrame
          The frame that is being painted to the window, where the last call to this render generated this image. This rasterized image may be painted to the window as many times as necessary before the next frame is requested.

        • charWidth

          int charWidth

        • charHeight

          int charHeight
